recipes.label: Pass a Barrier
recipes.startdescription: There is a barrier that opposes us. We can overcome it with the force of Forge or guile of Knock.
recipes.description: There is a barrier that opposes us. We can overcome it with the force of Forge or guile of Knock.

recipes.label: Fire and Acid
recipes.startdescription: Mix the reagents into a glorious mixture and apply it certain fingers. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Nitrate and Chloride
recipes.startdescription: Mix the reagents into a volatile mixture and apply it with anticipating fingers. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Sulphur and Salt
recipes.startdescription: Mix the reagents into an unstable mixture and apply it with trembling fingers. We may yet succeed.

recipes.label: Through the Cracks
recipes.startdescription: Like princes, we will demand passage through locks and barriers. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Through the Keyhole
recipes.startdescription: Like snakes, we will find paths through locks and barriers. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Through the Treshhold
recipes.startdescription: Like thieves, we will coax movement through locks and barriers. We may yet succeed.
